thread.title: Dwyane Wade’s Chinese Photo Diary
thread.title_full: Dwyane Wade’s Chinese Photo Diary - Vogue

author: Edward Barsamian
title: Dwyane Wade’s Chinese Photo Diary
text: For those who aren’t able to make it all the way to China, take comfort in knowing that the Met has extended this year’s Costume Institute exhibition, “ China: Through the Looking Glass ,” to the public until September 7. And one couple at this year’s Met Gala , Dwyane Wade and wife Gabrielle Union, were clearly taken by the Eastern influences as earlier this summer they traveled to China where Wade presented his latest kicks with Li-Ning and a new wine with Pahlmeyer. Here, the six-foot-four-inch shooting guard shares a peek inside his trip which included learning proper greetings and hanging with pandas.
